name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shylnk - Shorten links and share secrets

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shorten your links and share secrets messages with SHYLNK in easier way like never before

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shylnk chrome extension is a one-click solution that offers multiple features besides just shortening the URL. With Shylnk in hands, never spend time in shortening the links by copying them and opening the new site to shorten. Shylnk offers of following services.

*Shorten your links (say goodbye to large unreadable links using Shylnk URL shortener)

*Customize your links (promote yourself or your brand while sharing with others)

*Protect your links with a key (When shared with a group of people only the people who are aware of the key will be able to access the link)

*Limit number of visitors (limiting number of people who visit your link)

*Choose your validity (it is your link, so you decide expiry date)

*Toggle the status of the link (make the link active or inactive whenever required)

*Shows adds and your message to visitors with a redirection time  (you can decide whether to or not to show ads based on your interest, you can even show a custom message to visitors while redirecting)

*Share secrets with ease (generate a URL for your messages, images, links which can be customized and shareable with others.)

*Track your links and visitors.

*Manage your links(you can freely edit password, visitor limit, validity anytime you wish to)

*Default settings for the links you generate fasten the parameters for your link and secrets(you can change the default settings anytime).

* Much more....

Happy shylinking :)
